                      warning = FALSE,

```{r, import the data}
tlc = read.table("./TLC.dat") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  rename(id = v1,
         group = v2,
         week0 = v3,
         week1 = v4,
         week4 = v5,
         week6 = v6)%>%
  mutate(group = recode(group,"P" = 0,"A" = 1))%>%
           as.data.frame()

zerbe2 = read.table("./ZERBE2.DAT") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  rename(group = v1,
         id = v2,
         "0h" = v3,
         "0.5h" = v4,
         "1h" = v5,
         "1.5h" = v6,
         "2h" = v7,
         "3h" = v8)
```
